description: The DND / CAF, DIMCBM has a requirement for Project Manager - Senior to assist with development and evolution of Microsoft D365 initiatives as stated in RFPs Statement of Work.",
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### P.8-Project Leader- Senior for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)
#### Reference: W3330-24-200
#### Amendment: 3

### Tender Information
* **Title**: P.8-Project Leader- Senior for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)
* **GSIN**:  D302A Informatics Professional Services
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and more (full list available in the tender description or tender documents)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ottawa
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR) and Ottawa

### Project Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) and Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) require a senior project leader to assist with the development and evolution of Microsoft D365 initiatives. This requirement is part of the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply, which is refreshed three times a year.

### Tender Submission
The tender submission is open to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Stream 5 for services in the National Capital Region for the category of P.8-Project Leader- Senior. The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture Inc.
* Axons Canada Inc., Levio Conseils Inc., IN JOINT VENTURE
* BDO Canada LLP
* C3SA CYBERNETIC SECURITY AUDIT INC., M B FOSTER ASSOCIATES LTD., in joint venture
* Calian Ltd.
* DWP Solutions Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* Factr Limited
* Modis Canada Inc
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
* Taligent Consulting Inc.
* The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc. (client suggested)
* The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated
* TRM Technologies Inc.

### Proposal Evaluation
The tender submission will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The contract will be awarded to the bidder who achieves the highest combined rating.

### Security Requirements
The project requires a Common PS SRCL #6 security standard, with a minimum corporate security requirement of Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and a minimum resource security requirement of Secret.

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence (DND
